Params[3]: Sniff. It doesn't smell suspicious. Should be safe.
Noctis gave me a box last time. It exploded when I opened it and covered my face with grease.
He also gave me a box the time before that. My hands were stuck to the box with glue when I opened it.
And the time before that time...

Params[2]: It's the person that's suspicious, not the box!

Params[3]: No. 21 puts down the gift and walks toward you. You instinctively take a step back, but not before she grabs you by the collar and starts sniffing you.
Sniff. You don't smell suspicious. The commandant should be safe.
No. I'm keeping this box. I'll come back to sniff you the next time I find it suspicious, Commandant.
